Shivani Kapur and Lucy Cohu (Broadchurch) star as Nin in dramatisations of different periods of her life. Writer and broadcaster Rowan Pelling is among those contributors who have been affected and influenced by Nins work

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming tours the less-celebrated sights of Brighton, beginning by visiting the Toy and Model Museum to look at its collection of model trains. He then discovers a boutique that sells a variety of unusual items, before taking a glimpse behind the scenes at the Royal Pavilion

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor heads to New Orleans and meets soul singer Irma Thomas at the Hotel de Monteleone, an establishment that was popular with writers such as Tennessee Williams, F Scott Fitzgerald and Ernest Hemingway. Richard speaks to Steel Magnolias author Robert Harling about the Soniat House, check into the supposedly haunted Hotel Maison de Ville and talks to burlesque dancer Chrissy Owens at the Roosevelt

programme.title: Julia
programme.desc: Drama inspired by Julia Childs extraordinary life and her long-running television series, The French Chef. In 1992, Julia Child pitches a groundbreaking idea for television centred on demonstrations for the home cook. Starring Sarah Lancashire and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Julia
programme.desc: Facing mounting pressure from station executives, Julia struggles to figure out how to present a complicated recipe. Later, on-set flubs threaten the future of the show

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Part three of three. The detectives are divided as the investigation into the murder of Felix Wilsons employee continues, and racial tensions are brought to the fore

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: A woman is discovered badly beaten and left for dead and the detectives attempt to track down the culprit

programme.title: My Brilliant Friend
programme.desc: While on holiday, Lilas son Gennaro fights with Elenas daughters. In a phone call, Lila tells Elena that her sister Elisa is seeing Marcello Solara. In Italian

programme.title: Game of Thrones

Meanwhile, Catelyn takes the captive Tyrion east in search of refuge at the Eyrie, home of her sister Lysa. Fantasy drama, starring Sean Bean and Mark Addy

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Ned is reinstated by Robert and hears rumours that associates of the Lannisters have begun stirring up trouble across the Seven Kingdoms. Tyrion concocts a risky scheme to escape the Eyrie, Brans first trip outside the castle since his accident nearly ends in tragedy, and Viserys causes uproar in Khal Drogos home city. Drama, starring Sean Bean

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: The Capaccios strike out at Sangue Blu as they set out to conquer Forcella. An isolated Enzo risks not only losing his turf, but also his mens loyalty. In Italian

programme.title: Gomorrah
programme.desc: Having realised the cause of all of her misfortunes, Patrizia is finally forced to face up to a life-changing decision. In Italian

programme.title: It: Welcome to Derry
programme.desc: In 1962, a couple with their son move to Derry, Maine, just as a young boy disappears and very bad things begin to happen in the town. Supernatural horror prequel to Stephen Kings novel It, starring Jovan Adepo, Chris Chalk, Taylour Paige, James Remar, Stephen Rider and Bill Skarsgård

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony meets his fathers former lover Fran, and helps her get her rightful share of the racetrack but, while Hesh is willing to pay up, Phil is late with the money. Christopher goes to collect a debt from screenwriter JT Dolan, but ends up checking him into rehab. Junior takes advantage of a loophole that lets him leave prison to go to funerals, and Tony tells Dr Melfi his encounter with Fran has brought back traumatic memories

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: Hood deals with a hitman from Portland who arrives in town looking to recover a debt from a robbery Jason carried out. Meanwhile, Gordon sinks to a new low, and Job shares information regarding Rabbit and the diamond heist. Drama, starring Antony Starr

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Ned is reinstated by Robert and hears rumours that associates of the Lannisters have begun stirring up trouble across the Seven Kingdoms. programme.desc: Lord Tywin readies his son Jaime for battle as House Lannister prepares for conflict, and Ned confronts Cersei about what he has learnt while investigating Jon Arryns death. Meanwhile, at the Wall, Jon Snow waits to make his vows to the Nights Watch, and across the sea, Khal Drogo vows revenge on the Seven Kingdoms in response to the attempted assassination of Daenerys. Starring Charles Dance and Sean Bean

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Everyday life at Northumberlands Chillingham Castle, where the members of staff try to tactfully deal with the whims of their employer, baronet Humphry Wakefield, as the estate prepares to welcome a band of ghost-hunting tourists. Meanwhile, Carlton Towers in East Yorkshire hosts an annual dog show for Afghan hounds

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: Lord and Lady Fitzalan Howard try to impress American guests at Carlton Towers with a programme of traditional activities, including skinning rabbits and taking high tea. Meanwhile, Sir Humphry Wakefield entertains tourists on a wine-tasting weekend at Chillingham Castle

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming explores the history of Bristol, beginning by learning a grisly secret at the docks before meeting Mercury Prize-winning musician Roni Size to discuss life in the St Pauls and Stokes Croft areas of the city. He also explores the district of Clifton and visits a speakeasy-style bar

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor heads to Tokyo and checks out the Park Hyatt, the hotel featured in the film Lost in Translation, and goes behind the closed doors of the Japanese capitals love hotels. In the fashionable district of Meguro, Richard takes in the Claska, which was the citys first boutique hotel and has its own canine beauty salon

programme.title: Julia
programme.desc: A bad roll of videotape leads to reshoots and a dubious decision to replace chicken with a less savoury meat. Starring Sarah Lancashire and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Pembleton and Bayliss are the first officers on the scene when a man is pushed between two subway cars, leaving them to uncover whether it was an accident or attempted murder. Cop drama, starring Yaphet Kotto and Kyle Secor

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: Bayliss gets a surprise which could alter his holiday plans, while Ballard and Gharty investigate the death of an HIV positive man and Munch is at loggerheads with his ex-wife. Cop drama, starring Yaphet Kotto and Peter Gerety

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Lord Tywin readies his son Jaime for battle as House Lannister prepares for conflict, and Ned confronts Cersei about what he has learnt while investigating Jon Arryns death. Meanwhile, at the Wall, Jon Snow waits to make his vows to the Nights Watch, and across the sea, Khal Drogo vows revenge on the Seven Kingdoms in response to the attempted assassination of Daenerys. programme.title: Game of Thrones

Robb rounds up his allies as he prepares to confront Tywins troops, while Tyrion forms an unlikely alliance with a savage tribe. At Kings Landing, Arya and Syrio are forced to fight for their lives, and a sinister new enemy emerges at Castle Black. Meanwhile, Daenerys tries to reconcile her lust for power with the shocking brutality of war

programme.title: Sweetpea
programme.sub-title: This Sort of Thing Needs Some Feminine Energy
programme.desc: Rhiannons victim is discovered, so she goes on a mission to find out who he was and whether he deserved it

programme.title: The Iris Affair
programme.desc: Iris uses her wits to get herself out of a corner and enlist policewoman Nico, while Joy meets mysterious genius Jensen Lind

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Family and friends gather at the Soprano household to celebrate the birthday of Carmelas father. Johnny Sack shows off his new car, and Tony Blundetto considers taking on a job for his old mentor. Gritty crime drama, starring James Gandolfini, Lorraine Bracco and Steve Buscemi

programme.title: Banshee
programme.desc: When Hood discovers that Proctor brutally killed Jason there are dramatic repercussions for the towns crime lord. The sheriff involves Brock and a few of his contacts from outside the office to help with his revenge mission as he plans to take down a Proctor-run drug operation. Elsewhere, Ana returns to the world of crime in order to get the medicine she needs for her son Max, while Alex finds himself receiving a vote of no confidence at the tribal council. Drama, starring Antony Starr

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: While Kendall, Shiv and Roman consider an aggressive move regarding the Matsson deal, Connor tries to make the most of his wedding rehearsal dinner

programme.title: The Iris Affair
programme.desc: Iris concocts an audacious plan to rescue Joy, involving a dramatic reunion with Cameron, then they are forced to flee with Alfie and Nico

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Battle commences as the Lannisters launch their bid to seize the throne. programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Aided by his chauffeur, who is a kung fu expert and a technical genius, he fights to bring down a powerful gangster. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz

programme.title: Red Right Hand
programme.desc: Cash is attempting to live an honest and quiet life, but when Big Cat forces him back into her services, he proves capable of anything to protect the town and the only family he has left. Thriller, starring Orlando Bloom and Andie MacDowell

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Ruler of the Persian empire and self-proclaimed god Xerxes continues his campaign to crush the emerging Greek nation, forcing a general from the democratic city state of Athens to lead his navy into battle against Xerxes vast armada. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Sullivan Stapleton, Eva Green and Lena Headey

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, Baby, a young getaway driver with tinnitus, takes part in a heist which seems doomed to fail, especially as the characters involved lose touch with reality as events spiral out of control. Writer/director Edgar Wrights Bafta-winning, music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Lily James, Jamie Foxx, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A Manhattan-based military scientist finds himself immune to a virus that turns humans into ferocious vampire-like creatures. After the disease has swept across the world, wiping out an estimated 90 per cent of the human population, he devotes his solitary existence to finding a cure by unlocking the secret within his blood. Sci-fi thriller, starring Will Smith, Alice Braga and Charlie Tahan

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Ancient titans Godzilla and Kong clash in an epic battle against an undiscovered threat hidden within the Earth. Director Adam Wingards blockbusting fantasy adventure, starring Rebecca Hall, Dan Stevens and Brian Tyree Henry

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: A soldier of fortune joins an academic and her conniving brother on an expedition to an ancient Egyptian lost city. The explorers accidentally cause the spirit of a vengeful priest with awe-inspiring supernatural powers to rise from his tomb, leading to a desperate battle for survival. Fantasy action adventure, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo and Oded Fehr

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: A military officer goes in search of a power-mad general who is holding several hostages in a secret location. He soon finds he is not the only one on the maniacs trail, and joins forced with a mismatched band of martial artists to save the captives. Action adventure based on the video game, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Raul Julia, Kylie Minogue and Ming-Na Wen

programme.title: Red Right Hand
programme.desc: Cash is attempting to live an honest and quiet life, but when Big Cat forces him back into her services, he proves capable of anything to protect the town and the only family he has left. Thriller, starring Orlando Bloom and Andie MacDowell

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a major heist against the US Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its mint facilities. Action thriller, starring Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace and Ryan Kwanten.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: A gladiator in the ancient Roman city falls in love with the daughter of a wealthy merchant, who is being forced into marriage with a corrupt senator. When the nearby volcano Vesuvius erupts, he fights to save her and escape the destruction of the city. Disaster movie, starring Kit Harington, Emily Browning, Carrie-Anne Moss and Kiefer Sutherland

programme.title: Blacklight
programme.desc: Travis Block is a government operative coming to terms with his shadowy past. When he discovers a plot targeting US citizens, Block finds himself in the crosshairs of the FBI director he once helped protect. Action thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Aidan Quinn and Taylor John Smith

programme.title: The Bricklayer
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Steve Vail is reactivated when an extortionist targets the agency. Director Renny Harlins thriller based on the Noah Boyd novel, starring Aaron Eckhart, Nina Dobrev and Clifton Collins Jr

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Ancient titans Godzilla and Kong clash in an epic battle against an undiscovered threat hidden within the Earth. Director Adam Wingards blockbusting fantasy adventure, starring Rebecca Hall, Dan Stevens and Brian Tyree Henry

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: A mercenary is assigned a target on a flight, but when rival assassins board the plane, the hunter and the hunted are forced to team up. Action thriller, starring Josh Hartnett, Katee Sackhoff and Julian Kostov

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: A soldier of fortune joins an academic and her conniving brother on an expedition to an ancient Egyptian lost city. The explorers accidentally cause the spirit of a vengeful priest with awe-inspiring supernatural powers to rise from his tomb, leading to a desperate battle for survival. Fantasy action adventure, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo and Oded Fehr

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Married explorers Rick and Evelyn battle the newly resurrected mummy Imhotep and his ruthless partner, who have captured their son. The undead creature is heading for a confrontation with a legendary ancient warrior - with power over a magical army to be won. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo, Oded Fehr and Patricia Velasquez, with a brief appearance by Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a world dominated by deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator, and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: Blacklight
programme.desc: Travis Block is a government operative coming to terms with his shadowy past. When he discovers a plot targeting US citizens, Block finds himself in the crosshairs of the FBI director he once helped protect. Action thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Aidan Quinn and Taylor John Smith

programme.title: Pompeii

When the nearby volcano Vesuvius erupts, he fights to save her and escape the destruction of the city. Disaster movie, starring Kit Harington, Emily Browning, Carrie-Anne Moss and Kiefer Sutherland

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: Divorced couple Jane and Jake are reunited at their sons college graduation after 10 years apart, and end up sleeping together. Despite Jakes marriage to a younger woman and Janes fledgling romance with a kindly architect, the pair end up having a clandestine affair. Romantic comedy, starring Meryl Streep, Alec Baldwin and Steve Martin

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Aliens declare war on Earth having seen video games from the 1980s and interpreted them as a threat. Their attack comes in the form of deadly recreations of classic video games, so the US government recruits four former arcade champions to repel the attack. Sci-fi comedy, starring Adam Sandler and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Wisecracking Detroit detective Axel Foley returns to Los Angeles to investigate the shooting of an old friend, and uncovers a connection with a spate of violent robberies carried out by a criminal who leaves a mysterious calling card. Comedy thriller sequel, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, John Ashton, Ronny Cox and Brigitte Nielsen.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs the World
programme.desc: A directionless bassist meets the girl of his dreams, but finds that romancing her comes with a dangerous catch. She has seven evil ex-lovers, all endowed with tremendous fighting skills or superpowers - and before he can go out with her, he is expected to face each one in a battle to the death. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Jason Schwartzman

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Dim-witted friends Harry and Lloyd are reunited after 20 years. When Harry discovers he has a daughter he never knew about, he breaks his friend out of a psychiatric hospital and they go on a road trip with the intention of fulfilling parental responsibilities neither of them is capable of. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two hapless Americans get caught up in the machinations of the Mob, and are forced to deliver a cash-stuffed envelope to a mysterious Mr Smith in a far corner of Australia - but a wily kangaroo bounds off with the money, leaving the friends desperate to retrieve it before the gangsters catch up with them. Comedy, starring Jerry OConnell, Christopher Walken, Anthony Anderson and Estella Warren

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancees latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: Mr Deeds
programme.desc: A naive pizza parlour owner inherits $40billion and moves to New York, where he encounters unscrupulous opportunists keen to get their hands on the money - and a ruthless reporter determined to tell his story. Remake of 1936 romantic comedy Mr Deeds Goes to Town, with Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder, John Turturro, Allen Covert, Peter Gallagher and Jared Harris

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: A washed-up quarterback ends up in jail after a drunken night out, and is ordered by the warden to put together an American football team to take on the guards, with the help of a former college champ. Remake of 1974 comedy The Mean Machine, with Adam Sandler, Chris Rock, Nelly and Burt Reynolds, who starred in the original

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: A power-crazed bully, a sleazy cocaine addict and a sexual predator each make an employees life a misery, but the three workers cannot afford to quit their jobs. They resort to desperate measures by conspiring to murder each others bosses, with a little help from an eccentric ex-convict. Comedy, starring Jason Bateman, Charlie Day, Jason Sudeikis, Kevin Spacey, Jennifer Aniston and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monasterys financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monasterys financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Maverick cop Axel Foley returns to Los Angeles when an investigation into a colleagues murder leads him to a Hollywood theme park. He enlists the help of old ally Rosewood to prove the resort is a cover for a major counterfeiting ring connected to a terrorist conspiracy. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Theresa Randle and Bronson Pinchot.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtiss romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Thirtysomething slacker Dupree finds himself out of a job with nowhere to live, and turns to his newly married best friend Carl for a place to stay. But Carl comes to regret his act of hospitality as the layabout shows no sign of ever moving out - not to mention his annoyance when his new wife takes a liking to their laid-back guest. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Matt Dillon, Kate Hudson and Michael Douglas.

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Two heavy-metal fans broadcast an amateur TV programme from their basement. A slimy network executive offers them the chance to turn professional, but as they enjoy the perks of wealth and fame, they find their show being ruined by corporate interference. Comedy, starring Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Rob Lowe, Tia Carrere and Lara Flynn Boyle, with a cameo by Alice Cooper

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Heavy metal fanatics Wayne and Garth try to stage a giant Woodstock-style rock festival, with a little help from a spaced-out British roadie and the ghost of Jim Morrison. But Wayne also has to stop his girlfriend leaving him for her slimy manager. Comedy sequel, starring Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Ralph Brown, Kim Basinger, Tia Carrere and Christopher Walken

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: A lonely boy makes a wish at Christmas that his teddy bear will come to life, which is magically granted. The boy grows up to become a directionless slacker, with the foul-mouthed living toy still his inseparable friend - but his girlfriend thinks it is time for him to grow up. Comedy, starring Mark Wahlberg and Mila Kunis, directed by and featuring the voice of Seth MacFarlane

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: The foul-mouthed talking teddy bear is horrified to discover that he counts as property according to the law. He and his human best friend hire a pot-smoking lawyer to help them fight a court case and get Ted legally recognised as a person. Comedy sequel, starring Mark Wahlberg and Amanda Seyfried, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Another batch of outrageous stunts is lined up by the death-defying friends, who get chased by bulls, used as human shark bait, have leeches attached to their eyes and ride a giant rocket. Comedy sequel, starring Johnny Knoxville, Bam Margera, Steve-O, Chris Pontius and Ryan Dunn

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: An ordinary man has a vision that the end of the world is coming. A series of inexplicable natural disasters confirms that the apocalypse is indeed at hand, and he leads a band of misfits on a perilous journey across their city in search of the means to save Earth. Spoof comedy, starring Matt Lanter and Vanessa Minnillo

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: An immature 32-year-old is heartbroken when his girlfriend walks out on him. In a plan to win her back, he volunteers to look after his flatmates five-year-old son, thus demonstrating he is finally ready to grow up. However, his ideas of childcare prove unconventional and chaos quickly ensues. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Josh Mostel, Leslie Mann, Rob Schneider and Kristy Swanson, alongside Steve Buscemi in a cameo role

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An unlikely pair of brothers, who were born as the result of a one-off genetic experiment and separated at birth, are reunited in adulthood. They set out on a cross-country search for their unknown mother - fending off vicious loan sharks and a professional assassin along the way. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Kelly Preston and Chloe Webb

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: The ragtag soldiers of the Walmington-on-Sea Home Guard are given the chance to prove their mettle by apprehending three German aviators who have parachuted into the country in the vanguard of a suspected Nazi invasion. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Arthur Lowe, John Le Mesurier, Clive Dunn, Bill Pertwee, Ian Lavender and Arnold Ridley

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: A second-rate ice-hockey player with a thuggish temperament discovers he has a powerful golf swing. He decides to enter a prestigious tournament to raise enough money to save his debt-ridden grandmothers house from falling into the hands of tax inspectors. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Christopher McDonald, Carl Weathers, Julie Bowen and Frances Bay

However, his ideas of childcare prove unconventional and chaos quickly ensues. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: A boy watching an action movie is transported into the film by a magic ticket and meets its hero figure, who refuses to believe he is a fictional character. Matters take a turn for the worse when the screen villain gets hold of the ticket and crosses over into the real world - where bad guys can win. Comedy adventure, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Austin OBrien, Charles Dance, F Murray Abraham and Anthony Quinn

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: An alcoholic former professional player reluctantly agrees to train an all-female baseball team during the Second World War. With star player Dottie Hinson and her sister Kit on board, they look set to dominate the league - until sibling rivalry rears its head. Comedy drama, starring Geena Davis, Lori Petty, Tom Hanks and Madonna

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: A banker is wrongly jailed for his wifes murder and over the course of a life sentence he forms a close friendship with a fellow inmate. He also earns a position of trust as book-keeper to the corrupt prison governor - but makes an enemy of his benefactor as he tries to clear his name. Frank Darabonts drama, starring Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler, Clancy Brown and Gil Bellows

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Composer Antonio Salieri is a favoured artist in the court of Austrian emperor Joseph II, but he finds himself pushed aside in favour of Mozart. Salieri admires the younger maestros music, but is incensed that someone so vulgar and obnoxious should be gifted with such talent. As jealousy consumes him, he plots his rivals downfall. Period drama, adapted by Peter Shaffer from his own play and starring F Murray Abraham and Tom Hulce

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: An idealistic sports agent produces a mission statement at work promising to treat clients fairly. Unfortunately, it costs him his job. Forced to set up an agency on his own, the only people prepared to stand by him are a lovelorn staff accountant and a footballer. Cameron Crowes romantic comedy drama, with Tom Cruise, Renee Zellweger, Kelly Preston, Jonathan Lipnicki, and Cuba Gooding Jr, who won an Oscar for his performance

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A young soldier devastated by his nightmarish experiences in the Vietnam War is committed to an Army mental hospital. He comes to believe he is a bird, and dreams of taking his fantasy to the logical, ultimate conclusion - by learning to fly. Alan Parkers psychological drama, based on William Whartons novel, with Matthew Modine, Nicolas Cage, John Harkins, Karen Young and Sandy Baron

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview - October 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A mysterious gunfighter intervenes when a man and his family are threatened by a predatory cattle baron determined to force every homesteader in the valley off the land. The situation rapidly escalates into violence, while an unspoken attraction develops between the gunman and the settlers wife. Western, starring Alan Ladd, Jack Palance, Van Heflin and Jean Arthur. Based on the novel by Jack Schaefer

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA analyst gets caught up in the Colombian drug trade while trying to track down terrorists responsible for the murder of a close friend of the US president - but his investigations point to illegal activity and corruption at the very top of government. Action thriller, based on Tom Clancys novel, with Harrison Ford reprising his role from Patriot Games alongside Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer and James Earl Jones

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind, hard-drinking war veteran pays a timid college student to accompany him on a weekend break in the big city, where he plans to make the most of life. However, the youngster is shocked to learn that at the end of their trip, his new friend plans to kill himself. Comedy drama, starring an Oscar-winning Al Pacino, Chris ODonnell, Gabrielle Anwar and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: A banker is wrongly jailed for his wifes murder and over the course of a life sentence he forms a close friendship with a fellow inmate. He also earns a position of trust as book-keeper to the corrupt prison governor - but makes an enemy of his benefactor as he tries to clear his name. Frank Darabonts drama, starring Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler, Clancy Brown and Gil Bellows

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: A group of conspirators contracts the Jackal, a professional hitman, to assassinate President Charles de Gaulle of France. The killer starts to put his painstaking plans into action, creating a new identity, establishing his alibi and commissioning a custom-made weapon, while out-foxing the French police at every turn. Fred Zinnemanns adaptation of Fredericks Forsyth thriller, with Edward Fox, Michael Lonsdale, Alan Badel, Tony Britton and Cyril Cusack

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agents nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersens thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Four teenagers are sentenced to reform school after a prank results in the accidental death of an old man, and suffer sexual abuse at the hands of the guards. Years later, when the boys have grown up and begun to follow very different professions, a chance encounter with one of their abusers inspires them to plot revenge. Drama, starring Brad Pitt, Robert De Niro, Dustin Hoffman, Kevin Bacon, Jason Patric and Minnie Driver

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: An isolated, misanthropic New York cab driver becomes increasingly disturbed by the corruption he sees all around him. His desperate attempts to make connections with a political campaigner and a teenage prostitute, whom he feels compelled to save, seem doomed to failure, and he is gradually driven towards a brutal act of violence. Martin Scorseses drama, starring Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster, Cybill Shepherd and Harvey Keitel

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A married lawyer has a one-night stand with a business associate while his wife and children are out of town. He hopes to keep his infidelity a secret, but she is determined to continue the relationship, and begins obsessively stalking him and his unsuspecting family. Thriller, starring Michael Douglas, Glenn Close and Anne Archer

programme.title: Ick
programme.desc: A science teachers life changes when he reconnects with his first love and suspects a new student is his daughter, all while facing an alien threat in their town. Sci-fi comedy drama, starring Brandon Routh, Mena Suvari and Malina Pauli Weissman

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A half-human canine is sworn to protect and serve as he faces feline supervillain Petey the Cat. Animated comedy, with the voices of Pete Davidson, Poppy Liu, Lil Rel Howery and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: An international action superstar gets involved in a rescue operation of a beloved zoo panda named Hu Hu. Chinese comedy, starring Jackie Chan and Xiang Wei, with subtitles

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A half-human canine is sworn to protect and serve as he faces feline supervillain Petey the Cat. Animated comedy, with the voices of Pete Davidson, Poppy Liu, Lil Rel Howery and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: Recently widowed Bridget enters the dating game once again, caught between her sons science teacher and a man 20 years her junior. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Hugh Grant, Leo Woodall and Colin Firth

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: When a spy is suspected of treason, her husband faces the ultimate test - loyalty to his marriage or his country. Director Steven Soderberghs thriller, starring Michael Fassbender, Cate Blanchett and Rege-Jean Page

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in an attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his relationship. Covering as his marriage counsellor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Comedy drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Britt Lower and John Magaro

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: Two buddies sneak into a party on New Years Eve 1999, but the night turns even crazier as the clock hits midnight. Director Kyle Mooneys teen horror comedy, starring Jaeden Martell, Rachel Zegler and Julian Dennison

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family become convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs. Steven Soderberghs horror thriller, starring Lucy Liu, Chris Sullivan, Callina Liang and Eddy Maday

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final shift, a burned-out paramedic has to train his keen but inexperienced replacement. What begins as a routine night soon descends into a chaotic, citywide odyssey that tests their endurance. Co-writer/director Christopher Leones action comedy, starring Rainn Wilson, Lil Rel Howery and Aimee Carrero

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell

programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in an attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his relationship. Covering as his marriage counsellor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Comedy drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Britt Lower and John Magaro

programme.title: Lake George
programme.desc: Two misfits embark on a road trip, take a dubious deal and find redemption amid shady circumstances. Crime thriller, starring Carrie Coon and Shea Wingham

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut attempts to stay sane while on a troubled mission to Saturns moon, Titan. Director Mikael Hafstroms sci-fi thriller, starring Casey Affleck, Laurence Fishburne, Emily Beecham and David Morrissey

programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father, only to discover his shallow grave is now empty. Thriller, starring Daniel Portman, Brian Vernel and Paul Higgins

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: A chain of bizarre and deadly incidents in several countries leads scientists to the conclusion that the Earths core has stopped spinning. As chaos erupts around the world, experts hatch a plan to halt the destruction and save the human race - but it involves venturing deep below the planets surface to detonate a nuclear bomb. Sci-fi thriller, starring Aaron Eckhart, Hilary Swank, Stanley Tucci and DJ Qualls

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A mutated virus sweeps across America, turning most of the population into hideous flesh-eating zombies. A hard-drinking fearless adventurer leads a small band of young survivors on a perilous journey through the wasteland in search of a safe haven. Comedy horror, with Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Emma Stone and Abigail Breslin

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: A decade after they joined forces, survivors Tallahassee, Columbus, Wichita and Little Rock have become experts in identifying and disposing assorted zombies. They set up their new home in the abandoned White House, but after Little Rock heads to Graceland, the team attempts to save her from a group of super zombies. Director Ruben Fleischers comedy horror sequel, starring Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg and Emma Stone

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As his behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: Two parents do whatever it takes to keep their children safe in a world full of creatures hunting every sound they hear. Nothing can be heard from the family hiding in silence, but all it takes is one noise and everything can go horrifically wrong. Horror, starring real-life husband-and-wife duo Emily Blunt and John Krasinski, who also directed

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: During a day trip to watch a theatre performance, terminally ill cancer patient Sam witnesses Earths terrifying first contact with the Death Angels - sightless creatures, which hunt by sound. Calmly resigned to her demise, she embarks on a lonely trek to Harlem to enjoy a final slice of pizza from the restaurant where her late father took her as a child. Horror prequel, starring Lupita Nyongo, Joseph Quinn and Alex Wolff

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut attempts to stay sane while on a troubled mission to Saturns moon, Titan. Director Mikael Hafstroms sci-fi thriller, starring Casey Affleck, Laurence Fishburne, Emily Beecham and David Morrissey

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist tests an invisibility serum on himself, but becomes dangerously intoxicated by the power he acquires. He abandons his morals and heads out into the city to take full advantage of his condition. Realising he has been up to no good, concerned colleagues decide to confront him - with terrible consequences. Paul Verhoevens sci-fi thriller, starring Kevin Bacon, Elisabeth Shue, Josh Brolin and Kim Dickens

programme.title: The Cinema List: Jurassic (2025)
programme.desc: Welcome to a Cinema List 65 million years in the making, going through the best moments from the Jurassic franchise - from the 1993 original to Jurassic World: Dominion

programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father, only to discover his shallow grave is now empty. Thriller, starring Daniel Portman, Brian Vernel and Paul Higgins

programme.title: Restore Point
programme.desc: In central Europe during 2041, a female detective investigates the case of a slain couple where a restoration team is able to bring one of them back to life. Sci-fi thriller, starring Andrea Mohylova, Matej Hádek and Milan Ondrík

programme.title: Simulant
programme.desc: A humanoid enlists a global hacker to remove all restrictions on his thoughts, triggering an AI uprising. Director April Mullens sci-fi thriller, starring Robbie Amell, Jordana Brewster and Simu Liu

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A journalist investigates several teenage deaths, which are linked to a cursed videotape and the rumour that anyone who watches it will die a week later. Her growing obsession with the tape endangers herself and her family - and to avoid the predicted fate, she has just seven days to find out where the recording came from. Gore Verbinskis remake of the Japanese supernatural horror, starring Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson and Brian Cox

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: Two parents do whatever it takes to keep their children safe in a world full of creatures hunting every sound they hear. Nothing can be heard from the family hiding in silence, but all it takes is one noise and everything can go horrifically wrong. Horror, starring real-life husband-and-wife duo Emily Blunt and John Krasinski, who also directed

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: During a day trip to watch a theatre performance, terminally ill cancer patient Sam witnesses Earths terrifying first contact with the Death Angels - sightless creatures, which hunt by sound. Calmly resigned to her demise, she embarks on a lonely trek to Harlem to enjoy a final slice of pizza from the restaurant where her late father took her as a child. Horror prequel, starring Lupita Nyongo, Joseph Quinn and Alex Wolff

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A mutated virus sweeps across America, turning most of the population into hideous flesh-eating zombies. A hard-drinking fearless adventurer leads a small band of young survivors on a perilous journey through the wasteland in search of a safe haven. Comedy horror, with Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Emma Stone and Abigail Breslin

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap

They set up their new home in the abandoned White House, but after Little Rock heads to Graceland, the team attempts to save her from a group of super zombies. Director Ruben Fleischers comedy horror sequel, starring Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg and Emma Stone

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: On the desert planet Arrakis, freedom fighters Paul and Chani galvanise the Fremen to strike down murderous conspirators against the Atreides dynasty. Sci-fi drama based on Frank Herberts acclaimed novel, starring Timothee Chalamet, Zendaya, Austin Butler and Rebecca Ferguson

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Two astronauts are left stranded in orbit above the Earth when the debris from an exploding satellite destroys their shuttle. Left drifting in space with no way to contact mission control, they begin a perilous journey to reach the safety of a space station before their oxygen supply runs out. Thriller, starring Sandra Bullock and George Clooney

programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: A woman is condemned to squander her life in pursuit of a man who does not return her admiration, and she only comes to her senses after lingering briefly in heavenly limbo. Fantasy comedy, written, directed by and starring Alice Lowe, with Jacob Anderson, Nick Frost and Tanya Reynolds

programme.title: Dual
programme.desc: A woman named Sarah opts for a cloning procedure after she receives a terminal diagnosis. She unexpectedly recovers, but her attempts to have the clone decommissioned fail, leading to a court-mandated battle to the death. Sci-fi thriller, starring Karen Gillan and Aaron Paul

programme.title: Restore Point
programme.desc: In central Europe during 2041, a female detective investigates the case of a slain couple where a restoration team is able to bring one of them back to life. Sci-fi thriller, starring Andrea Mohylova, Matej Hádek and Milan Ondrík

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: After his daughter is murdered, a high school coach takes matters into his own hands and hunts down her killers. Action thriller, starring Dermot Mulroney, Jeff Fahey and Mauricio Mendoza

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: Acclaimed Japanese director Akira Kurosawas Oscar-winning thriller focusing on three eyewitnesses highly personal accounts of a rape and murder, which reveal the true characters and frailties of those involved. Toshiro Mifune, Machiko Kyo and Masayuki Mori star

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective Dirty Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors disapproval. Don Siegels thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agents nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersens thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: The seaside resort of Amity is terrorised once again by a man-eating great white shark. While police chief Brody struggles to alert the townsfolk to the magnitude of the danger, a group of teenagers - including Brodys two sons - is adrift at sea in waters hunted by the shark. Thriller sequel, starring Roy Scheider, Lorraine Gary and Murray Hamilton

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: Four magicians use their lavish stage shows as cover for a series of seemingly impossible heists, and give away the money they steal to their audiences. An FBI agent assembles a team of experts to discover how the baffling robberies are committed and what the secret agenda behind the crime spree is. Crime thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo, Woody Harrelson and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. Pope Pius XVI has died suddenly and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind involving a stolen canister of anti-matter. Ron Howard takes the reins once again for the sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks, Ewan McGregor, Ayelet Zurer, Stellan Skarsgard and Pierfrancesco Favino

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: A shark is captured by divers and put on display in a Florida marine centre, where it ultimately dies. However, examination of the body reveals the seemingly fully-grown shark was actually a baby - and its enormous, ferocious mother soon comes looking for it. Thriller sequel, originally released in cinemas in 3D, starring Dennis Quaid, Simon MacCorkindale, Louis Gossett Jr and Bess Armstrong

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: Four magicians use their lavish stage shows as cover for a series of seemingly impossible heists, and give away the money they steal to their audiences. An FBI agent assembles a team of experts to discover how the baffling robberies are committed and what the secret agenda behind the crime spree is. Crime thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo, Woody Harrelson and Isla Fisher

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Three brothers run an underground bootlegging operation in Depression-era Virginia. However, as their criminal activities become increasingly successful, a corrupt deputy sheriff demands a cut of the profits, forcing them to fight to defend their livelihood. Crime drama, starring Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, Jason Clarke, Gary Oldman and Guy Pearce

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: FBI agent Frank Castle enrages a powerful gangland kingpin when a gunfight accidentally causes the death of the mobsters son. The crime boss retaliates by wiping out Castles entire family, but the lawman reinvents himself as a vigilante, acting as judge, jury and executioner to the underworld. Thriller based on the Marvel comic-book anti-hero, starring Thomas Jane, John Travolta, Will Patton, Rebecca Romijn and Roy Scheider

programme.title: Sew Torn
programme.desc: A seamstress gets tangled in her own thread after stealing a suitcase during a drug deal gone wrong. Writer/director Freddy Macdonalds crime thriller, starring Eve Connelly, Calum Worthy and John Lynch

programme.title: The Line
programme.desc: A university student attempts to live his life without a fear of consequences. Co-writer/director Ethan Bergers drama, starring Alex Wolff, Lewis Pullman and Bo Mitchell

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Truck driver Johnny is inspired to establish the Vandals motorcycle club in 1960s Chicago. He assembles a motley crew, including Brucie, Benny, Cal and Zipco. Exuberant outsider Kathy falls under Bennys spell, and they marry, but when the groom is the victim of a violent assault, Johnny exacts revenge, while Kathy fights for her husbands tormented soul. Drama, starring Tom Hardy, Jodie Comer and Austin Butler

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption. Writer/director Jed Harts thriller, starring Lyndsey Marshal and Declan Adamson

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: A shark is captured by divers and put on display in a Florida marine centre, where it ultimately dies. However, examination of the body reveals the seemingly fully-grown shark was actually a baby - and its enormous, ferocious mother soon comes looking for it. Thriller sequel, originally released in cinemas in 3D, starring Dennis Quaid, Simon MacCorkindale, Louis Gossett Jr and Bess Armstrong

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. Pope Pius XVI has died suddenly and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind involving a stolen canister of anti-matter. Ron Howard takes the reins once again for the sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks, Ewan McGregor, Ayelet Zurer, Stellan Skarsgard and Pierfrancesco Favino

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A father returns to Australia to buy his childhood home. To celebrate, he takes his teenage son to Luna Bay so they can surf together. However, he becomes locked in a battle of one-upmanship with local thugs. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage and Julian McMahon

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: The captain of Russias first nuclear submarine is demoted for expressing fears that the vessel is unfit for commission. However, his anxieties prove well-founded when the reactor malfunctions, creating the possibility of a nuclear explosion the US would mistake for an attack - and potentially triggering a global conflict. Kathryn Bigelows fact-based thriller, starring Harrison Ford, Liam Neeson and Peter Sarsgaard

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: An oil prospector presents the public image of a caring family man while nurturing a murderous ambition to seize control of land and wealth at any cost. But his insatiable greed leads to a violent conflict with a young priest who is also intent on using the people and resources of an oil-rich town for his own ends. Paul Thomas Andersons historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Paul Dano and Dillon Freasier

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: FBI agent Frank Castle enrages a powerful gangland kingpin when a gunfight accidentally causes the death of the mobsters son. The crime boss retaliates by wiping out Castles entire family, but the lawman reinvents himself as a vigilante, acting as judge, jury and executioner to the underworld. Thriller based on the Marvel comic-book anti-hero, starring Thomas Jane, John Travolta, Will Patton, Rebecca Romijn and Roy Scheider

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A man is forced to witness the murder of his wife and daughter, and is driven to despair when one of the perpetrators walks free at trial. Years later, he begins a campaign of vigilante violence, seeking revenge on the killers and the justice system that failed to punish them, particularly an assistant district attorney who allowed the defendant to make a deal during the court proceedings. Thriller, with Gerard Butler and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker

programme.desc: People relive their harrowing encounters with the supernatural. Wendy and Glenn Laycock moved into a new home, only to find that a previous owner hasnt moved out. Plus, the home built on the site of a terrible tragedy apparently haunted by its past

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Kenny discovers motorcycle challenges at an El Monte auction caravan, while Rene and Casey find success with their box-filled storage unit. Dusty and Lupe lead with their parenting senses, while Lisas animal instincts lead her to the real cheddar

programme.title: Curse of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: A stunning UAP - Unidentified Anomalous Phenomena - appears above Skinwalker Walker Ranch during an experiment involving hundreds of illuminated drones. The timing of what happens next leaves the team members in disbelief

programme.title: Canadian Pickers
programme.desc: The guys make a rare Art Deco discovery and spot a weird item in Quebec. They are faced with sky-high prices and reluctant sellers, so they will need to turn on the charm

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick and Corey race to San Diego for a spin in the classic car Hells Chariot from the movie Grease. Chum takes a whack at a Punch-a-Bag game once played by Jack Dempsey

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: The team investigates when a neurosurgeon is killed moments before performing surgery, uncovering a set of clues that also shed light on the disappearance of four schoolboys 40 years earlier. However, McGarretts mind is temporarily taken off the case when his beloved car is stolen. Alex OLoughlin stars

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: McGarretts old mentor Joe White is back on the island, although the reunion is put on the back-burner when a patient infected with a lethal strain of bird flu is kidnapped. The team members know they have little time to waste if they are to find the victim and prevent the outbreak of a deadly epidemic. US crime drama, starring Alex OLoughlin and Scott Caan, with Terry OQuinn

programme.title: The Flash
programme.desc: Iris is visited by Nia Nal, but when they fall into a fever dream to explore different possibilities for their lives, Barry, Chester, Allegra and Cecile desperately try to help them. Meanwhile, Mark entertains Khione, but they have different ideas of what is fun

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: An ancient android implants the minds of the gang into robotic bodies. Back on Earth, the team members realise they are now machines - and face a dilemma as they ponder whether to sacrifice their new-found immortality. Richard Dean Anderson stars

programme.sub-title: There but for the Grace of God

programme.sub-title: E Imi Pono (Searching for the Truth)

programme.desc: Coverage from the WTA and/or ATP Tours, including the WTA Jiujiang Open, WTA Hong Kong Open, WTA Merida Open, and ATP Paris Masters

programme.title: Live Tennis
programme.desc: The ATP Paris Masters. Coverage of day two of the ATP 1000 event, a hard-court tournament at Accor Arena, featuring matches from the first and second rounds. British star Jack Draper was involved in an epic three-set encounter with American Taylor Fritz as this stage 12 months ago, and eventually prevailed 7-6, 4-6, 6-4 to guarantee his place in round three. The number three seed, Alexander Zverev, got his campaign off to a positive start when beating Tallon Griekspoor 7-6, 6-3, but the number six seed, Andrey Rublev, suffered an agonising 7-6, 7-6 loss to Francisco Cerúndolo

programme.title: Live EFL Cup
programme.desc: Wrexham v Cardiff City (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of the fourth-round match from StoK Racecourse, as the Welsh rivals meet for the first time in an English football competition since 2002. The hosts have risen up the leagues since the last time they met 23 years ago, claiming three successive promotions under manager Phil Parkinson. The last meeting between the sides at this ground in November 2001 saw Cardiff come away with a 3-1 victory

programme.title: Back Pages Tonight
programme.desc: A look at the sports headlines in tomorrows newspapers

programme.title: Sky Sports News
programme.desc: Round-up of the sports news, with live analysis and comment, plus extended interviews with the headline-makers

programme.title: Live NBA Basketball
programme.desc: Milwaukee Bucks v New York Knicks (Tip-off 12.00am). Coverage of the Eastern Conference match at Fiserv Forum. The visitors won all three meetings between these two teams last year, scoring at least 116 points in all three of those games. The last fixture between the sides at this venue ended in a 116-107 victory for the Knicks

programme.title: Live NBA Basketball
programme.desc: Golden State Warriors v Los Angeles Clippers (Tip-off 3.00am). Coverage of the Western Conference match at Chase Center in San Francisco , California. These two teams faced each other four times last season with the Clippers winning all four meetings. The last time they met at this venue was back in April when the game went to overtime before Los Angeles claimed a thrilling 124-119 win

programme.title: Live Tennis
programme.desc: Coverage from the WTA and/or ATP Tours, including the WTA Jiujiang Open, WTA Hong Kong Open, WTA Merida Open, and ATP Paris Masters

programme.title: Live Tennis
programme.desc: The ATP Paris Masters. Coverage of day three of the ATP 1000 event, a hard-court tournament at Accor Arena, featuring second-round matches. The number two seed at last years event, Carlos Alcaraz, got his quest for the title under way with a relatively routine 7-5, 6-1 win over Nicolás Jarry at the corresponding stage, avoiding the fate that befell fellow seeded players Daniil Medvedev and Casper Ruud, who lost in three sets to Alexei Popyrin and Jordan Thompson, respectively. Meanwhile, French wild card Adrian Mannarino continued his fine form by beating Zizou Bergs 3-6, 6-2, 6-4

programme.title: Live Tennis
programme.desc: The ATP Paris Masters. Coverage of day two of the ATP 1000 event, a hard-court tournament at Accor Arena, featuring matches from the first and second rounds. British star Jack Draper was involved in an epic three-set encounter with American Taylor Fritz as this stage 12 months ago, and eventually prevailed 7-6, 4-6, 6-4 to guarantee his place in round three. The number three seed, Alexander Zverev, got his campaign off to a positive start when beating Tallon Griekspoor 7-6, 6-3, but the number six seed, Andrey Rublev, suffered an agonising 7-6, 7-6 loss to Francisco Cerúndolo

programme.title: Live EFL Cup
programme.desc: Wrexham v Cardiff City (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of the fourth-round match from StoK Racecourse, as the Welsh rivals meet for the first time in an English football competition since 2002. The hosts have risen up the leagues since the last time they met 23 years ago, claiming three successive promotions under manager Phil Parkinson. The last meeting between the sides at this ground in November 2001 saw Cardiff come away with a 3-1 victory

programme.title: Live NBA Basketball
programme.desc: Milwaukee Bucks v New York Knicks (Tip-off 12.00am). Coverage of the Eastern Conference match at Fiserv Forum. The visitors won all three meetings between these two teams last year, scoring at least 116 points in all three of those games. The last fixture between the sides at this venue ended in a 116-107 victory for the Knicks

programme.title: Live NBA Basketball
programme.desc: Golden State Warriors v Los Angeles Clippers (Tip-off 3.00am). Coverage of the Western Conference match at Chase Center in San Francisco , California. These two teams faced each other four times last season with the Clippers winning all four meetings. The last time they met at this venue was back in April when the game went to overtime before Los Angeles claimed a thrilling 124-119 win

programme.desc: Lecce v Napoli (Kick-off 5.30pm). Coverage of the Italian top-flight match from Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del mare. The visitors did the double over their hosts last season, winning both games 1-0 and will be looking for three more important points in their quest for back-to-back titles. This meeting last year saw Giacomo Raspadori score the only goal of the game in the 24th minute to give Napoli the three points

programme.title: Live: Serie A
programme.sub-title: Live Serie A: Atalanta v AC Milan
programme.desc: Atalanta v AC Milan (Kick-off 7.45pm). Coverage of the Italian top-flight match from Gewiss Stadium. These two sides met three times last season, including a Coppa Italia quarter-final meeting that saw the hosts come away with a 2-1 victory thanks to a Teun Koopmeiners double. This fixture last season saw Adeloma Lookman score an 87th-minute winner to give Atalanta all three points

programme.title: Gadget Man
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade looks at how technology can be used to make the most of a weekend - from helping with chores and assisting with a workout, to a night out and the journey home. TV presenter Steve Jones joins in to review the equipment, before Al Murray and Sara Pascoe arrive to test out gadgets in the pub

programme.title: Gadget Man
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade sets out to see if there are devices to improve life at work, testing a solar briefcase that recharges gadgets, a hand massager for soothing tired fingers and a portable hammock for the feet. Comedian Dara O Briain helps him investigate a giant interactive touchscreen, a zero gravity desk and a virtual reality office assistant, while journalist Grace Dent helps look at gadgets designed for exercising in the office

programme.title: Border Force: Americas Gatekeepers
programme.desc: Officers are suspicious when an elderly couple arrive from Mexico with five suitcases but no clothes, and a truck carrying garden furniture has something extra in the load

programme.title: Border Force: Americas Gatekeepers
programme.desc: Officers become suspicious when they pull over a businessman from Mexico who is making a rare journey to the United States in a brand new car

programme.title: Cape Carnage: Killer Catch
programme.desc: Captain Bruce steers the Wildcard to a fishing spot that has never failed them before, but triumph quickly turns to turmoil when a pregnant Jess injures her stomach

programme.title: Cape Carnage: Killer Catch
programme.desc: The Wildcard crew is just a week away from unloading their catch at the port of Karumba when Captain Bruce decides to go to a fishing ground that is known for its risks

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Sean Kelly and the bidders are looking for treasure in Somersets storage units, where a bouncy castle and an air boat are among the finds

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Heavy D is in town and is prepared to risk having his fingers burned for the chance of a big score, while auctioneer Sean Kelly keeps a watchful eye

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Sean Kelly and the hunters are off to Leeds, where a new pair of bidders arrive - and they are not afraid to throw their weight around. Meanwhile, Sam and Ione re-ignite their feud

programme.title: Storage Hunters UK
programme.desc: Sean Kelly oversees UK bidders looking for treasures in Ipswich. With Heavy D back in town the bargaining buccaneers are being driven mad by the booming bidder

programme.title: Extreme Salvage Squad
programme.desc: Team Salvage is on a time-critical mission to retrieve a scammed derelict yacht from a crocodile breeding ground, and Team West Coast chase a triple-tow big cash payday

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May set out for the seaside in electric cars the Nissan Leaf and Peugeot iOn, stopping off in Lincoln along the way. Louis Walsh gets behind the wheel of the Reasonably Priced Car, Richard Hammond meets an extraordinary rally team in which everyone, from mechanics to drivers, is an amputee with a military background, and the Lamborghini Aventador is taken out on the track

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May put three supercars through their paces in Italy. Their weapons of choice are the 691bhp Lamborghini Aventador, McLarens hi-tech MP4-12C, and a British brute in the form of the Noble M600. The journey begins at Nardo, a high-speed testing ground so vast it can be seen from space, and includes a nerve-racking drive in Rome before reaching its conclusion with a timed challenge against the Stig at the Imola circuit

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers explore Britains love of apples and pears, using them in recipes for beef tagine and a frangipane tart. They also visit a heritage orchard to sample a few of the 2,000 apple varieties grown in the UK and investigate the history of wassailing - a custom intended to ensure a fruitful crop in cider-producing areas

programme.title: Rick Steins Spain
programme.desc: Having spent a series travelling across Spain and sampling classic dishes from the countrys rural regions, Rick Stein draws culinary inspiration from that trip to create a series of dinner-table feasts that would befit any Spanish yuletide celebration. The chef prepares clams with serrano ham and oloroso sherry, lamb-stuffed aubergines with Moorish spices, chicken with saffron and pine nuts, and orange caramel creams

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Rob Brydon introduces a seasonal special of the comedy panel game. TV presenter and poker whizz Victoria Coren Mitchell, BBC Breakfast anchor Naga Munchetty, Last Leg co-host Alex Brooker and veteran actor Melvyn Hayes join team captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack to hoodwink their opponents with a few festive fibs or facts about themselves. So, did Victoria really once shock husband David with one of her Christmas presents to him? And did Alex once tip the bin men £500?

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Yasmine Akram, Cariad Lloyd, Geoff Norcott and Dennis Taylor go toe-to-toe testing their general knowledge skills in a variety of trivia-based games across the week

programme.title: Gadget Man
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade focuses on technology for protection and security, making sure the Gadget Man house is kitted out with a smartphone-activated lock, scanning visitors with a portable metal detector and putting a robot on patrol. He is joined by actor Keith Allen to test a wallet tracker, a vest that makes the wearer look more muscular and a bulletproof bag, and also meets up with comedian Bill Bailey at a Cold War era nuclear bunker in Essex to try out a post-apocalyptic survival kit - much of which can also be used for camping holidays or festivals

programme.desc: Part one of two. When a skull is found buried in concrete in a church crypt, Boyd seeks to find out who it belongs to and why it is there, but gets little help from the Church authorities who seem bent on obscuring the facts. When another body is discovered the finger of guilt points to a workman, but why has a retired priest been so uncooperative and why is the corpse adorned with ritualistic symbols? Boyd resolves to solve the case and confront his own demons over the disappearance of his son at the same time. He seems to understand their problems and offers to help, but what effect will spending time with this kindly stranger have on their lives? Starring Jessica Hynes and Noah Valentine

programme.title: Toast of London
programme.desc: When Ed dates former Beauty Queen Penvelope, Steven starts seeing her friend, weather girl Clancy Moped. However, their blossoming romance is jeopardised when the men are asked to judge the international beauty contest for women, and it all starts to look dodgy when the host, Vic Titball, collects them in a muddy pick-up truck

programme.title: Toast of London
programme.desc: Things begin to look up when Sacker is cast alongside Steven in West End play Man of Sex. Meanwhile, Toast dates doctor of drumming Varrity Map, but when her rhythm grows irritating and Sacker succumbs to booze after the opening night, he is left to deal with his nemesis Ray Purchase and his even worse twin brother. Starring Matt Berry, Doon Mackichan and Robert Bathurst

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom is tempted to earn some extra money, but it is not to pay the bills or replenish his dwindling savings. Comedy, starring Richard Briers, Felicity Kendal, Penelope Keith and Paul Eddington. First broadcast in 1975

programme.title: Keeping Up Appearances
programme.desc: Hyacinth attends the christening of Daisys granddaughter, and is displeased to learn the childs parents are not married. programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Compo and Clegg hatch a devious plan to free henpecked Wally and Howard from their wives - if only for a few hours. Bill Owen and Peter Sallis star

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: After Clegg is visited by three teenage missionaries, Seymour believes it is about time he offered his considerable talents and services to the local vicar, so sets about selling tickets for its staging of The Tales of Beatrix Potter. Peter Sallis and Michael Aldridge star

programme.title: Hi-de-Hi!
programme.desc: Yvonne organises a petition to get rid of Mr Partridge, who has been antagonising the staff, but theres no sign of the offending puppeteer. Ted and Spike return to their chalet for the night and see what appears to be his body floating in the pool with a knife in his back. Comedy, starring Paul Shane and Diane Holland

programme.title: Blackadder
programme.desc: The fearsome Duke of Wellington challenges Prince George to a duel. Edmund volunteers to take his place, secretly intending to have his insane Scottish cousin MacAdder fill in for him. Comedy, guest starring Stephen Fry, with Rowan Atkinson, Tony Robinson and Hugh Laurie

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Seymour vows that the days of Edie having to carry a dustbin are over, and promises to install a waste disposal unit for her. Meanwhile, a former wartime comrade of Wallys makes an appearance. Michael Aldridge, Thora Hird and Joe Gladwin star

Starring Matt Berry, Doon Mackichan and Robert Bathurst

programme.title: Nick Knowles Big House Clearout
programme.desc: Nick meets the Parmar family in their west London terraced house, a property filled with a huge number of possessions. Couple Ranjan and Jeetendra share their home with son Shaneel, daughter Shainey and Shaineys partner Johannes. In return for clearing out at least half of their belongings, Nick and his team will change their house with a spectacular makeover

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: Property Brothers: Forever Homes
